name: WP SpeedUp
author: Fahad Mahmood

sections.description:
• Author: Fahad Mahmood
  • Project URI: http://androidbubble.com/blog/wordpress/plugins/wp-speedup

WP SpeedUp is a great plugin to implement to install and forget about the page load speed issues. You can change settings from wp-admin or can leave it to default, you will feel significant difference in your website page load speed.

Compatibility List

  • Guava Pattern
  • Genesis
  • Thesis
  • WooThemes
  • Gantry
  • Carrington Core
  • Hybrid Core
  • Options Framework
  • Redux Framework
  • SMOF
  • UPThemes
  • Vafpress
  • Codestar

Arbitrary section

I would appreciate the suggestions related to new features. Please don’t forget to support this free plugin by giving your awesome reviews.

A brief Markdown Example

Ordered list:

  1. Can be used with WooCommerce Products Website
  2. Support is not available because i am already working on its next versions
  3. Developed according to the WordPress plugin development standards

License

sections.installation:
How to install the plugin and get it working:

Method-A:

  1. Go to your wordpress admin “yoursite.com/wp-admin”

  2. Login and then access “yoursite.com/wp-admin/plugin-install.php?tab=upload

  3. Upload and activate this plugin

  4. Now go to admin menu -> settings -> WP SpeedUp

Method-B:

  1. Download the WP SpeedUp installation package and extract the files on your computer.
  2. Create a new directory named wp-speedup in the wp-content/plugins directory of your WordPress installation. Use an FTP or SFTP client to upload the contents of your WP SpeedUp archive to the new directory that you just created on your web host.
  3. Login to the WordPress Dashboard and activate the “WP SpeedUp” plugin.
  4. Once the plugin is activated, a new WP SpeedUp sub-menu will appear in your WordPress admin -> settings menu.
sections.faq:
Is this compatible with all WordPress themes?

Yes, it is compatible with all WordPress themes which are developed according to the WordPress theme development standards.

How can i report an issue to the plugin author?

It’s better to post on support forum but if you need it be fixed on urgent basis then you can reach me through my blog too. You can find my blog link above.
sections.changelog:
1.4.6

  • Updated version for WordPress. [02/05/2023]

1.4.6

  • Updated version for WordPress.

1.4.5

  • Improved user experience and UI.

1.4.4

  • Reviewed.

1.4.3

  • Languages added. [Thanks to Abu Usman]

1.4.1

  • Sanitized input and fixed direct file access issues.

1.3.0

  • A few important server side checks are implemented.
  • User interface improved.
  • Improved User Experience.
  • Video Tutorial Added.

1.2.0

  • Basic Mode & Advanced Mode are introduced.
  • .htaccess related settings provided with appropriate guidance.
  • pingdom and google pagespeed test buttons provided.
  • Useful articles added as reference for .htaccess understanding.
  • WP Speedup plugin banner added.
  • WordPress Mechanic avatar added.
  • An alert added to JS minification section.
  • Guava Pattern added in compatibility list.

1.1.0

  • Improved usability.

1.0

  • Initial Commit
